mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.my_plan_timestep_id AS "myPlanTimestep.id", a.user_channel_id AS "userChannel.id", a.channel_type AS "channelType", a.operation_type AS "operationType", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cdboo_my_plan_timestep_channel a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM cdboo_my_plan_timestep_channel a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cdboo_my_plan_timestep_channel( id, my_plan_timestep_id, user_channel_id, channel_type, operation_type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{myPlanTimestep.id}, #{userChannel.id}, #{channelType}, #{operationType}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cdboo_my_plan_timestep_channel SET my_plan_timestep_id = #{myPlanTimestep.id}, user_channel_id = #{userChannel.id}, channel_type = #{channelType}, operation_type = #{operationType}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
